scroll_cure_wounds.name: Scroll of Cure Wounds
scroll_cure_wounds.description: A scroll inscribed with the Cure Wounds spell. Touch heals wounds through divine grace.. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_fadi.name: Scroll of Regeneration
scroll_fadi.description: A scroll inscribed with the Regeneration spell. A regenerative spell. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_heal.name: Scroll of Heal
scroll_heal.description: A scroll inscribed with the Heal spell. Channel divine energy to restore health.. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_komiza.name: Scroll of Ice Shard
scroll_komiza.description: A scroll inscribed with the Ice Shard spell. A small shard of ice. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_magic_missile.name: Scroll of Magic Missile
scroll_magic_missile.description: A scroll inscribed with the Magic Missile spell. A bolt of magical force that never misses its target.. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_motu.name: Scroll of Cure Wounds
scroll_motu.description: A scroll inscribed with the Cure Light Wounds spell. A minor healing spell. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_pakaza.name: Scroll of Thorn Whip
scroll_pakaza.description: A scroll inscribed with the Thorn Whip spell. A thorn. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_shield.name: Scroll of Shield
scroll_shield.description: A scroll inscribed with the Shield spell. Create a magical barrier that increases armor class.. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_teka.name: Scroll of Eldritch Blast
scroll_teka.description: A scroll inscribed with the Eldritch Blast spell. A weak beam of dark energy. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_dobuza.name: Scroll of Ray of Sickness
scroll_dobuza.description: A scroll inscribed with the Ray of Sickness spell. A bolt of green energy. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_frost_nova.name: Scroll of Frost Nova
scroll_frost_nova.description: A scroll inscribed with the Frost Nova spell. Freeze nearby enemies with a burst of cold.. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_invisibility.name: Scroll of Invisibility
scroll_invisibility.description: A scroll inscribed with the Invisibility spell. Become invisible to enemies.. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_kamaza.name: Scroll of Mana Drain
scroll_kamaza.description: A scroll inscribed with the Mana Drain spell. A bolt of blue energy. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_kamotu.name: Scroll of Heal
scroll_kamotu.description: A scroll inscribed with the Cure Moderate Wounds spell. A healing spell. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_kotari.name: Scroll of Create Food
scroll_kotari.description: A scroll inscribed with the Create Food spell. A restorative spell. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_watari.name: Scroll of Create Water
scroll_watari.description: A scroll inscribed with the Create Water spell. A refreshing spell that quenches thirst. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_lightning_bolt.name: Scroll of Lightning Bolt
scroll_lightning_bolt.description: A scroll inscribed with the Lightning Bolt spell. A stroke of lightning arcs toward a target.. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_muda.name: Scroll of Summon Lesser Beast
scroll_muda.description: A scroll inscribed with the Summon Lesser Demon spell. A minor summoning spell. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_murder.name: Scroll of Murder
scroll_murder.description: A scroll inscribed with the Murder spell. Murder oneshots anything.. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_tami.name: Scroll of Sacred Flame
scroll_tami.description: A scroll inscribed with the Sacred Flame spell. A weak beam of bright energy. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_toduza.name: Scroll of Fire Bolt
scroll_toduza.description: A scroll inscribed with the Fire Bolt spell. A small bolt of flame. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_toraza.name: Scroll of Stone Missile
scroll_toraza.description: A scroll inscribed with the Stone Missile spell. A stone shard. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_dobudani.name: Scroll of Cure Poison
scroll_dobudani.description: A scroll inscribed with the Cure Poison spell. A curative spell. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_fireball.name: Scroll of Fireball
scroll_fireball.description: A scroll inscribed with the Fireball spell. A blazing sphere of flame that explodes on impact.. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_igatok.name: Scroll of Cat's Grace
scroll_igatok.description: A scroll inscribed with the Cat's Grace spell. An enhancement spell that boosts the target's agility, increasing their dexterity by 5-20 points. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_kateka.name: Scroll of Eldritch Spear
scroll_kateka.description: A scroll inscribed with the Eldritch Spear spell. A beam of dark energy. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_komizuma.name: Scroll of Cone of Cold
scroll_komizuma.description: A scroll inscribed with the Cone of Cold spell. A shower of ice shards. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_modoki.name: Scroll of Lightning Bolt
scroll_modoki.description: A scroll inscribed with the Lightning Bolt spell. A bolt of lightning. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_rotok.name: Scroll of Bull's Strength
scroll_rotok.description: A scroll inscribed with the Bull's Strength spell. An enhancement spell that strengthens the target's physique, increasing their constitution by 5-20 points. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_takumi.name: Scroll of Remove Paralysis
scroll_takumi.description: A scroll inscribed with the Remove Paralysis spell. A curative spell. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_tsutok.name: Scroll of Bear's Endurance
scroll_tsutok.description: A scroll inscribed with the Bear's Endurance spell. An enhancement spell that bolsters the target's stamina, increasing their vitality by 5-20 points. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_yari.name: Scroll of Mage Armor
scroll_yari.description: A scroll inscribed with the Mage Armor spell. A protective enchantment that strengthens the target's defenses, granting +4 armor class. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_yilazi.name: Scroll of Vampiric Touch
scroll_yilazi.description: A scroll inscribed with the Vampiric Touch spell. A bolt of red energy. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_dakima.name: Scroll of Acid Arrow
scroll_dakima.description: A scroll inscribed with the Acid Arrow spell. A stream of acid. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_dobudanimaru.name: Scroll of Neutralize Poison
scroll_dobudanimaru.description: A scroll inscribed with the Neutralize Poison spell. A thick greyish mist. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_gimotu.name: Scroll of Greater Heal
scroll_gimotu.description: A scroll inscribed with the Cure Serious Wounds spell. A greater healing spell. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_igadani.name: Scroll of Curse of Weakness
scroll_igadani.description: A scroll inscribed with the Curse of Weakness spell. A dark spell that drains the target's agility, reducing their dexterity by 2-10 points. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_kamuda.name: Scroll of Summon Beast
scroll_kamuda.description: A scroll inscribed with the Summon Demon spell. A summoning spell. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_katami.name: Scroll of Searing Light
scroll_katami.description: A scroll inscribed with the Searing Light spell. A beam of bright energy. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_motumaru.name: Scroll of Mass Cure
scroll_motumaru.description: A scroll inscribed with the Mass Cure Light Wounds spell. A pale bluish mist. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_novadidan.name: Scroll of Charm Monster
scroll_novadidan.description: A scroll inscribed with the Charm Monster spell. A charm spell. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_rodani.name: Scroll of Wither
scroll_rodani.description: A scroll inscribed with the Wither spell. A dark spell that drains the target's physique, reducing their constitution by 2-10 points. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_sivama.name: Scroll of Gust of Wind
scroll_sivama.description: A scroll inscribed with the Gust of Wind spell. A powerful gust of wind. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_tamikar.name: Scroll of Hunger of Hadar
scroll_tamikar.description: A scroll inscribed with the Hunger of Hadar spell. A blast of dark energy. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_toduzuma.name: Scroll of Flame Strike
scroll_toduzuma.description: A scroll inscribed with the Flame Strike spell. A shower of flame. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_tsudani.name: Scroll of Enervation
scroll_tsudani.description: A scroll inscribed with the Enervation spell. A dark spell that drains the target's stamina, reducing their vitality by 2-10 points. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_dobumaru.name: Scroll of Cloudkill
scroll_dobumaru.description: A scroll inscribed with the Cloudkill spell. A dark greenish mist. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_gitami.name: Scroll of Flame Strike
scroll_gitami.description: A scroll inscribed with the Flame Strike spell. A beam of brilliant energy. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_giteka.name: Scroll of Eldritch Chain
scroll_giteka.description: A scroll inscribed with the Eldritch Chain spell. A crackling beam of dark energy. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_kamazadaku.name: Scroll of Mana Burn
scroll_kamazadaku.description: A scroll inscribed with the Mana Burn spell. A storm of blue energy bolts. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_kamotumaru.name: Scroll of Mass Heal
scroll_kamotumaru.description: A scroll inscribed with the Mass Cure Moderate Wounds spell. A bluish mist. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_komidaku.name: Scroll of Ice Storm
scroll_komidaku.description: A scroll inscribed with the Ice Storm spell. A storm of ice shards. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_komizadaku.name: Scroll of Blizzard
scroll_komizadaku.description: A scroll inscribed with the Blizzard spell. A storm of ice shards. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_kotarimaru.name: Scroll of Heroes' Feast
scroll_kotarimaru.description: A scroll inscribed with the Heroes' Feast spell. A thin brownish mist. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_watarimaru.name: Scroll of Create Water (Mass)
scroll_watarimaru.description: A scroll inscribed with the Create Water (Mass) spell. A cool blue mist that quenches the thirst of all allies. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_kusamotu.name: Scroll of Supreme Heal
scroll_kusamotu.description: A scroll inscribed with the Cure Critical Wounds spell. A very powerful healing spell. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_novadi.name: Scroll of Greater Invisibility
scroll_novadi.description: A scroll inscribed with the Greater Invisibility spell. An invisibility spell. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_pakazuma.name: Scroll of Spike Growth
scroll_pakazuma.description: A scroll inscribed with the Spike Growth spell. A shower of wicked thorns. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_torazuma.name: Scroll of Stone Shower
scroll_torazuma.description: A scroll inscribed with the Stone Shower spell. A shower of stone shards. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_yarimaru.name: Scroll of Shield of Faith (Mass)
scroll_yarimaru.description: A scroll inscribed with the Shield of Faith (Mass) spell. A bright yellow mist. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_gimuda.name: Scroll of Summon Greater Beast
scroll_gimuda.description: A scroll inscribed with the Summon Greater Demon spell. A greater summoning spell. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_kusatami.name: Scroll of Pillar of Flame
scroll_kusatami.description: A scroll inscribed with the Pillar of Flame spell. A devastating beam of brilliant energy. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_kusateka.name: Scroll of Eldritch Doom
scroll_kusateka.description: A scroll inscribed with the Eldritch Doom spell. A devastating beam of dark energy. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_modokidan.name: Scroll of Call Lightning
scroll_modokidan.description: A scroll inscribed with the Call Lightning spell. Several forked bolts of lightning. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_timimaru.name: Scroll of Fear
scroll_timimaru.description: A scroll inscribed with the Fear spell. A foul cloud of choking vapor. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_todudaku.name: Scroll of Firestorm
scroll_todudaku.description: A scroll inscribed with the Firestorm spell. A devastating firestorm. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_todukar.name: Scroll of Fireball
scroll_todukar.description: A scroll inscribed with the Fireball spell. A searing ball of flame. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_dakidaku.name: Scroll of Acid Storm
scroll_dakidaku.description: A scroll inscribed with the Acid Storm spell. A torrential downpour of acid. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_gimotumaru.name: Scroll of Greater Mass Heal
scroll_gimotumaru.description: A scroll inscribed with the Mass Cure Serious Wounds spell. A dark bluish mist. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_jinasudani.name: Scroll of Feeblemind
scroll_jinasudani.description: A scroll inscribed with the Feeblemind spell. A powerful dark spell that drains the target's mental faculties, reducing intelligence, wisdom, and charisma by 1-5 points each. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_jinasutok.name: Scroll of Fox's Cunning
scroll_jinasutok.description: A scroll inscribed with the Fox's Cunning spell. A powerful enhancement spell that greatly sharpens the target's mental faculties, increasing intelligence, wisdom, and charisma by 2-10 points each. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_komasidaku.name: Scroll of Elemental Chaos
scroll_komasidaku.description: A scroll inscribed with the Elemental Chaos spell. A storm of fire bolts and ice shards. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_poradani.name: Scroll of Finger of Death
scroll_poradani.description: A scroll inscribed with the Finger of Death spell. A powerful dark spell that drains the target's physical strength, reducing strength, dexterity, and constitution by 1-5 points each. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_poratok.name: Scroll of Divine Power
scroll_poratok.description: A scroll inscribed with the Divine Power spell. A powerful enhancement spell that greatly strengthens the target's physical prowess, increasing strength, dexterity, and constitution by 2-10 points each. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_sivadaku.name: Scroll of Whirlwind
scroll_sivadaku.description: A scroll inscribed with the Whirlwind spell. A violent windstorm. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_dobudakidaku.name: Scroll of Blight Storm
scroll_dobudakidaku.description: A scroll inscribed with the Blight Storm spell. A torrential downpour of dark green acid. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_ganazi.name: Scroll of Restoration
scroll_ganazi.description: A scroll inscribed with the Restoration spell. A curative spell. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_kusamuda.name: Scroll of Planar Binding
scroll_kusamuda.description: A scroll inscribed with the Gate spell. A very powerful summoning spell. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_modokidaku.name: Scroll of Storm of Vengeance
scroll_modokidaku.description: A scroll inscribed with the Storm of Vengeance spell. A lightning storm. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_novadimaru.name: Scroll of Mass Invisibility
scroll_novadimaru.description: A scroll inscribed with the Mass Invisibility spell. A thick black mist. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_dumoti.name: Scroll of Meteor Swarm
scroll_dumoti.description: A scroll inscribed with the Meteor Swarm spell. A maelstrom of searing flame clouds and huge ice shards. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_kusamotumaru.name: Scroll of Supreme Mass Heal
scroll_kusamotumaru.description: A scroll inscribed with the Mass Cure Critical Wounds spell. A very dark bluish mist. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_toradaku.name: Scroll of Earthquake
scroll_toradaku.description: A scroll inscribed with the Earthquake spell. A hail of huge stone shards. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_takumaru.name: Scroll of Paralyzing Touch
scroll_takumaru.description: A scroll inscribed with the Hold Person spell. A bolt of dark violet energy that paralyzes the target. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.

scroll_takumarudaku.name: Scroll of Mass Paralysis
scroll_takumarudaku.description: A scroll inscribed with the Hold Monster spell. A wave of dark violet energy that paralyzes all enemies. Reading it will teach you the spell permanently.
